body.name: Ravished by the Duke of Sin: A Historical Regency Romance Novel

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #12,255 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #75 in Historical British & Irish Literature #93 in Historical Regency Fiction #160 in Victorian Historical Romance (Kindle Store)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t Fight Love !
reviews.reviewText: A Relationship that Literally Starts With A Bang ! A Duke and A Lady brought together at her Brothers hunting party. He in a bad place after being jilted at the altar. She independent and wanting a career in the art world. Both having a different idea of marriage and Love . Coming from two different kinds of families. She growing up in a loving family and believing in Love . Where is family was cold , not caring , and his Father treated his Mother and himself cruelly . Making him Jaded to believe in Love. A whirlwind of excitement, a scandal to be solved, and emotions sizzling !Lady Alice Banfield was the daughter to the Earl of Oakley which her Brother Isaac now holds the title. She was considered the Wallflower of London . Independence was important to her. Being a gifted Artist was everything . Or was it ? She had a secret desire for Love !Levi Hoskins the Duke of Colborne was considered a good catch . Everyone wanted to be his Dutchess. He had just been jilted at the Altar. Now a scandal was started and tainting his good name. If he didn’t believe in love before this was certainly pushing him over the edge of doubt.Alice and Levi meet at her home when her brother inviting all his friends for a Hunting Party. There first introduction was something out of the ordinary. He seemed like a lost sole . She saw something in him and wanted to help. Chemistry, Need, Kismet, Destiny , who knows ? Only it works !This Magical , Enchanting , Love Story , Captures your Heart in Believing in none other than LOVE !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alice and Levi
reviews.reviewText: This romance involves two appealing characters, a well-defined plot filled with drama, mystery, personal demons, and a steamy romance. Both characters lacked interest in relationships, though one only yearned for love, whereas the other did not believe in love. Fate and a dramatic first encounter brings them together, while others try desperately to win them for themselves. This is another wonderful written story by this author. She continues to pull you in from the first page, keeping your interest and with her beautiful writing allowing the reader to become involved with the characters and scenes. I really enjoyed the ending with its surprise drama. A great read all historical romance fans would enjoy. I received a complimentary ARC, but I am voluntarily offering my personal opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Let me begin with, I like this author and the cover/title are very enticing. The characters are rich, well developed with a nice plot of getting over one disappointment and finding the right partner. Levi, one of the secondary characters is also great. What holds me back from a 5 is the length of the book. I really struggle with stories that go on and on as they become repetitive and gap fillers. That is my own personal opinion and yet I would encourage you to take a chance and make your own determination based on all the other positives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A hunting party leads to more
reviews.reviewText: A jaded Duke, a hunting party and a young lady artist are the main points of this regency romance. I liked Alice and Levi very much and I thought this was a wonderful classic story by the author. Great plot, great characters, great writing. I am very happy to have read this story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A different kind of lady
reviews.reviewText: Alice wasn't your tipical ton lady. She didn't really believe in love of a romantic type.. Alice was a painter, that,s what she believed in. Until she met Levi and almost shot him.Levi,s a Duke who doesn't believe in love, untill a beautiful lady pulls a gun on him. The two of them are like lost souls coming together. Thank you ♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must read!
reviews.reviewText: Levi went to a hunting party Alice's brother was having. They were instantly intrigued by the other. As they grew to know each other they talked about how neither wanted to marry but they couldn't stay away from each other. Feelings soon developed and love followed although neither would admit it. There were others that tried to come between them, but fate was on their side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Neither wants marriage
reviews.reviewText: The hero was just abandoned at the alter and was raised in an unloving home. The heroine aspires to be an artist. They meet when her Earl brother has a hunting party. The attraction is there, but as neither is seeking marriage what will they do. There are some twists and turns in this story before we get a HEA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has it all!
reviews.reviewText: Lush descriptions rule this Regency world.And of course, blue-stocking heroines are just the Best!The men are handsome, great lovers with bruised hearts.Villains more beastly than one could expect!Grab this book and enjoy it as much as I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: HE KNOWS HE WANTS HER - SO DOES SOMEBODY ELSE (HOT)
reviews.reviewText: LADY ALICE BANFIELD - Known to most as the wallflower of London, she was independent and quite outspoken with her views.Her brother Isaac the very wealthy New Earl of Banfield were very close he had decided to hold a hunting party on their estate inviting his friends from Eaton and Oxford, hoping Alice may find a suitor.LEVI - DUKE OF COLBORNE. - had arrived for the hunting party in a bit of a mess muddy clothes, he wanders around trying to find the ammunition room for the hunt (wishing he had not agreed to attend). He was escaping from scandal in London ( he has been left at the Alter by his fiancee), taking hold of a pistol and bullets he heard the click of a pistol behind him "WHO ARE YOU" her turns to see a young woman "I AM LEVI DUKE OF COLBORNE" Alice looks at the mans clothes and says "I DON'T THINK SO" and fires the gun at him.I'M GOING TO STOP HERE - ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT STORYLINE AND CHARACTERS I LOVED ESPECIALLY THE INTERACTION BETWEEN LEVI AND ALICE SO MUCH GOING ON AND NASTY PEOPLE. READ IT YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.I RECEIVED AN ARC COPY.

Sometimes you don't know what you really want or need until a well meaning person gives you a firm shove in the right direction. Alice and Levi instantly feel attracted to each other, the only question is whom they have to convince they are the perfect match - each other or themselves?

reviews.reviewTitle: the duke who didn’t believe in love
reviews.reviewText: What an engaging story ! So many plots snd twists. Levi was jilted at the altar and his Ex tarnished his image badly. He swore he will never love until he met his best friend’s sister. She is so different from the ladies of the ton and so selfless.. Alice goal is to help Levi clear his name from the scandal and love him despite he can’t return her feelings.Highly recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: A GOOD READ BUT A MISLEADING TITLE
reviews.reviewText: A nice story with a good plot and likable characters, a few steamy love scenes, some twists and a bit of suspense, but too long in my opinion, 250-300 pages would have been enough. And I think the title is rather misleading. Levi is more of a cinnamon roll hero and definitely not a Duke of Sin. He is innocently accused of deeds he didn’t commit, and he is not a rake.Alice‘s brother Isaac is a nice side character and I hope he will get his own story.After being jilted by his fiancée at the altar, Duke Levi falls into a melancholy. Once again he is betrayed by someone close to him. At the hunting party of his friend Isaac he meets his sister Alice and is immediately attracted by her. She is the only person who can soothe the turmoil in his soul and treats him like a man, not a duke.Alice is compassionate, forward and honest. She plans to become an artist and remain unmarried, but she is fascinated by her brother‘s friend Levi at the hunting party. She too is instantly attracted to him and realising that he suffers, she wants to help him heal.They quickly become friends and the passion between them flares up, but they first have to convince themselves and the other of their own feelings and overcome a few obstacles before they find a happy ending.For all readers who like books by the author, brooding heroes and strong heroines.
